Udaya Shankar Email: shankar@cs.umd.edu Current Position: Associate Professor of Computer Science Joint Appointment: UMIACS Academic Degree: Ph.D., University of Texas at Austin, 1982 DISTRIBUTED ALGORITHMS COURSE (CMSC 712, Fall 96) SOLUTION TO HW 3 and HW 4 (including "corrected" problem 2) RESEARCH ASSISTANTSHIPS RESEARCH INTERESTS: The design and analysis of distributed systems and network protocols, from both correctness and performance aspects.
